__e: Suddenly, all the metal fillings are being pulled out of her mouth.
I had said that you were the most beautiful girl in the world... and then you got all mad and said, "Get bent."
She's been throwing some fits and it's... the married life, my friend... it's not exactly what they say it is.
Okay, can everyone just stop freaking out and just give me, like, two minutes?
I'm hungry. I've got a back full of lead shot. The whole damn world and his dog are after my skin.
When it's just the three of us, it's fine, But anytime she gets a new guy, she stepfords out - and lets him make all the decisions.
